modName: Dangerous Curves 2 - UUNP BodySlide Preset - DELETED
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=3][b]Requires:[/b][/size][/font] UUNP BodySlide. HDT physics extension is optional for the jiggles - if ya know what I mean. 

This is an evolved version of my previous preset - "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85202?]Dangerous Curves[/url]"
The character used is - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85199/?]Amelia Rose[/url] - my personal racemenu preset .
The ENB is Grim and Somber - Azura.

[font=Georgia][size=3][b]Installation:[/b][/size][/font]
[list=1]
[*]Download and extract
[*]Go to Skyrim>>Data>>CalienteTools>>BodySlide>>SliderPresets>>(put the file in here!)
[*]Start BodySlide program, select this body from among the presets, batch build, done!
[/list]
Enjoy! Feel free to ask questions below...
author: wnisewond
